title: 2016 Austrian Grand Prix
summary: The 2016 Austrian Grand Prix (formally known as the Formula 1 Grosser Preis von Ã–sterreich 2016) was a Formula One motor race that was held on 3 July 2016 at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg, Austria. The race, which was contested over 71 laps, was the ninth round of the 2016 FIA Formula One World Championship, and marked the 30th running of the Austrian Grand Prix and the 29th time it had been held as a round of the Formula One World Championship since the series inception in 1950.
